My Creative Process

All of my design projects are based off of a carful design process to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Every design project begins by discussing what we know the poduct should have

2

Brainstorming & Concept

Throwing out concepts no matter how silly they sound

3

Planning & Development

Drawing mock-ups, creating prototypes, and testing

4

Feedback

Recieve feedback, and repeat step 3
